## Introduction {.sidebar}
This dashboard is being constructed for DACSS 690V: Visualizing Data, a course taught by Dr. Jose Manuel Magallanes Reyes in the Winter 2024 session at the University of Massachusetts Amherst. As of December 30, 2024, this dashboard contains one plot: a boxplot of student-teacher ratios at K-12 schools in Washington.
